1.content: So, to start, You are either Jake or mary. It's your birthday or the last day of summer.
1.title: who?

11.content:
Jake woke up late this morning, but it was his birth day today so it didn't mattter, anyway. he openned his eyes to see nothing. He pulled the covers off his head and moaned,"I hate mornings."

" I know what you mean," said a voice. Jake snapped his head around. Did he find anything?
11.title: Jake b-day

info.brief_description: you come across an amulet that gives you the power to make some one obay your every wish.
info.description:
My first story. ; anything gose, try to keep the chapters long.

the jist is you get an amult that letsyou give commands to someone, they may know it's happening butcan not resist with sucsess. the commands are like "You now fear the color of your skin" or " You are forbbiden to wear clothes" or even "yor think you are a servant and you are the opisite gender" (the last one makes them a girl or boy respectivly, and act like a servant)



Charicters are; Jake or Marry, you

older and younger sistters, you decide

mom, Rachle

dad, dosen't hang oround, barrtholemue or Barry

you also have to be reasonabley close. Enjoy And good adds=big points!!!!!!
